Detailed Description

Class vtkToolLaparoscopy, abstract the use of a surgical laparoscopic tool.

vtkToolLaparoscopy abstracts the use of a surgical tool during the simulation exercise. This provide an easy use of surgical tools collections.

Member Function Documentation

void vtkToolLaparoscopy::AddDepth ( double  step  )  [virtual]

Add a distance to the current tool depth.

Set the tool depth position. The modification is made by transforming the tool's mesh (vtkPolyData).

Parameters:
Position Z axis value (local coordinate system)

void vtkToolLaparoscopy::RotateX ( double  angle  )  [virtual]

Rotate the tool in degrees from current orientation about the X axis using the right hand rule.

Standard laparoscopic tool X-axis rotation. Mobile pieces are processed in implementation classes (vtkToolPincers, vtkToolScissors, etc...)

Reimplemented from vtkTool.

Reimplemented in vtkToolPincers.
